Title: Requires the New York state thruway authority to provide notice, a description of meeting details and a sign up list prior to meetings of the board
Summary: Requires the New York state thruway authority to provide notice, a description of meeting details and a sign up list prior to meetings of the board.
LawCode: Amd ยง352, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the New York state thruway authority to provide notice, a description of meeting details and a sign up list prior to meetings of the board
